00038  * otherwise the default FW library configuration file must be included instead

00049 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00053 /*********************************************************************/
00058 void SYSTICK_InternalInit(uint32_t time)
00059 {
00060         uint32_t cclk;
00061         float maxtime;
00062 
00063         cclk = SystemCoreClock;
00064         /* With internal CPU clock frequency for LPC17xx is 'SystemCoreClock'
00065          * And limit 24 bit for RELOAD value
00066          * So the maximum time can be set:
00067          * 1/SystemCoreClock * (2^24) * 1000 (ms)
00068          */
00069         //check time value is available or not
00070         maxtime = (1<<24)/(SystemCoreClock / 1000) ;
00071         if(time > maxtime)
00072                 //Error loop
00073                 while(1);
00074         else
00075         {
00076                 //Select CPU clock is System Tick clock source
00077                 SysTick->CTRL |= ST_CTRL_CLKSOURCE;
00078                 /* Set RELOAD value
00079                  * RELOAD = (SystemCoreClock/1000) * time - 1
00080                  * with time base is millisecond
00081                  */
00082                 SysTick->LOAD = (cclk/1000)*time - 1;
00083         }
00084 }
00085 
00086 /*********************************************************************/
00092 void SYSTICK_ExternalInit(uint32_t freq, uint32_t time)
00093 {
00094         float maxtime;
00095 
00096         /* With external clock frequency for LPC17xx is 'freq'
00097          * And limit 24 bit for RELOAD value
00098          * So the maximum time can be set:
00099          * 1/freq * (2^24) * 1000 (ms)
00100          */
00101         //check time value is available or not
00102         maxtime = (1<<24)/(freq / 1000) ;
00103         if (time>maxtime)
00104                 //Error Loop
00105                 while(1);
00106         else
00107         {
00108                 //Select external clock is System Tick clock source
00109                 SysTick->CTRL &= ~ ST_CTRL_CLKSOURCE;
00110                 /* Set RELOAD value
00111                  * RELOAD = (freq/1000) * time - 1
00112                  * with time base is millisecond
00113                  */
00114                 maxtime = (freq/1000)*time - 1;
00115                 SysTick->LOAD = (freq/1000)*time - 1;
00116         }
00117 }
00118 
00119 /*********************************************************************/
00126 void SYSTICK_Cmd(FunctionalState NewState)
00127 {
00128         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00129 
00130         if(NewState == ENABLE)
00131                 //Enable System Tick counter
00132                 SysTick->CTRL |= ST_CTRL_ENABLE;
00133         else
00134                 //Disable System Tick counter
00135                 SysTick->CTRL &= ~ST_CTRL_ENABLE;
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*********************************************************************/
00145 void SYSTICK_IntCmd(FunctionalState NewState)
00146 {
00147         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00148 
00149         if(NewState == ENABLE)
00150                 //Enable System Tick counter
00151                 SysTick->CTRL |= ST_CTRL_TICKINT;
00152         else
00153                 //Disable System Tick counter
00154                 SysTick->CTRL &= ~ST_CTRL_TICKINT;
00155 }
00156 
00157 /*********************************************************************/
00162 uint32_t SYSTICK_GetCurrentValue(void)
00163 {
00164         return (SysTick->VAL);
00165 }
00166 
00167 /*********************************************************************/
00172 void SYSTICK_ClearCounterFlag(void)
00173 {
00174         SysTick->CTRL &= ~ST_CTRL_COUNTFLAG;
00175 }
00180 #endif /* _SYSTICK */
